description:
Detects installation of a potentially suspicious new shim with an uncommon extension using sdbinst.exe.
Adversaries may establish persistence and/or elevate privileges by executing malicious content triggered by application shims
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Shim Database Installation via Sdbinst.EXE
query: (event.category:process AND ((process.executable:/.*\\[Ss][Dd][Bb][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:/[Ss][Dd][Bb][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:/.*\.[Ss][Dd][Bb].*/) OR ((process.parent.executable:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.executable:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Dd][Bb][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Mm]\ \-[Bb][Gg].*/)) OR ((process.parent.executable:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.executable:/.*\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Dd][Bb][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Mm][Mm]/)))))
